Working in the Gift

A method of exchange based on trust.

There are no formal contracts. Just a consensual willingness to trust. Don‚Äôt worry—we‚Äôll still have time lines, deliverables, and super-fun strategy sessions. The websites and logos aren‚Äôt free and value-less. They have value. What precisely that value is—is up to you.

The time is ripe for alternatives. I know. It feels weird. It‚Äôs my way of taking a step toward a world I want to live in. A world with more personal weight tied to every transaction.

I'm moved and inspired by a local bakery/farm trying it. They pulled their sourdough bread off the shelves and now give hundreds of loaves away every weekend. They make enough money to meet their needs and, more importantly, are making waves.

I‚Äôve had the honor of working on four projects so far in the Gift. We‚Äôve exchanged branding and websites for cash, handmade beds, carved signs, beer, and bread.
